en: Everything Tom predicted came true.
zh: 汤姆预测的一切都应验了。

en: Tom always comments on my clothes.
zh: 汤姆总是评论我的衣服。

en: Tom isn't accustomed to city life.
Tom isn't used to city life.
Tom isn't used to living in the city.
zh: 汤姆不习惯住在城市里。

en: All of Tom's predictions came true.
zh: 汤姆的所有预测都应验了。

en: I believe that this isn't a good idea.
zh: 我认为这不是一个好主意。

en: I believe this isn't a good idea.
zh: 我认为这不是一个好主意。

en: Tom bought a Chinese-Japanese dictionary.
zh: 汤姆买了一本汉日词典。

en: Tom bought a Japanese-Chinese dictionary.
zh: 汤姆买了一本日汉词典。

en: He ate insects and spiders.
Tom's house burned down.
I'd like a large portion of rice, please.
zh: 请给我来一份大份的米饭。

en: Please give me a large bowl of rice.
Please give me a large serving of rice.
zh: 请给我一份大份的米饭。

en: If you order tonkatsu at that place, it also comes with a mountain of cabbage.
zh: 如果你在那家店点猪排，还会附赠一大堆卷心菜。

en: I haven't read "War and Peace" either.
zh: 我也没读过《战争与和平》。

en: This dictionary is completely useless.
I've decided to take a nap.
Lately Tom hasn't been paying me any attention.
zh: 最近汤姆一直没怎么注意我。

en: This laboratory is equipped with the latest computers.
zh: 这个实验室配备了最新的电脑。

en: There aren't enough chairs in the conference room.
I don't want to study today.
It's the first time I hear this word.
zh: 这是我第一次听到这个词。

en: This is the first time I've heard that word.
zh: 这是我第一次听到这个词。

en: I ate some potato chips.
I ate some crisps.
I ate potato chips.
I've eaten.
Both of Tom's sons died in the war.
zh: 汤姆的两个儿子都死于战争。

en: Tom is a language geek.
Tom is a language nerd.
What's the meaning of this?
Tom will be a hundred years old next year.
Tom will be a centenarian next year.
Tom was condemned to death.
I threw away my shoes.
Tom showed off his new mobile phone.
Tom showed off his new cellphone.
What's the longest German word?
zh: 最长的德语单词是什么？

en: What's the longest English word?
zh: 最长的英语单词是什么？

en: It takes an hour to get to the station on foot.
zh: 步行到车站要一个小时。

en: It takes an hour to walk to the station.
Tom is always sleeping in class. It almost seems like he goes to school just to catch up on his sleep.
zh: 汤姆总是在课堂上睡觉。他好像上学只是为了补觉。

en: Tom is always sleeping in class. It almost seems as if he goes to school just to catch up on his sleep.
zh: 汤姆总是在课堂上睡觉。他好像上学只是为了补觉。

en: There is a secret base on the other side of the moon.
zh: 月球背面有一个秘密基地。

en: Tom is a bit older than Mary.
Tom was just about to go out when the phone rang.
zh: 汤姆正要出门，电话就响了。

en: Tides are caused by the moon's gravity.
zh: 潮汐是由月球的引力引起的。

en: Tom is naked from the waist up.
Tom lost 30 kilograms.
Mary is the youngest of the three sisters.
zh: 玛丽是三姐妹中最小的。

en: Where is the hotel?
Tom drinks 100% pure orange juice every day.
Tom tried to forget his love sorrow by playing the piano.
zh: 汤姆试图通过弹钢琴来忘记失恋的痛苦。

en: Is this for sale?
Are these for sale?
Tom speaks Japanese better than Japanese do.
zh: 汤姆日语说得比日本人还好。

en: Tom speaks Japanese better than the Japanese do.
zh: 汤姆日语说得比日本人还好。

en: This adaptation by a popular writer has given a new life to this classic.
zh: 这位著名作家的改编赋予了这部经典作品新的生命。

en: The adaptation by a popular writer has breathed new life into this classic.
zh: 这位著名作家的改编为这部经典注入了新的活力。

en: She held on to me to prevent me from going.
His skill in English truly astounds me.
zh: 他的英语水平真让我惊讶。

en: Tom won the International Chopin Piano Competition.
zh: 汤姆赢得了国际肖邦钢琴比赛。

en: Tom said that he saw the invisible man today.
zh: 汤姆说他今天看到了隐形人。

en: I have to sell it today.
During his year of study abroad, Tom's French improved rapidly.
zh: 在国外留学的一年里，汤姆的法语进步很快。

en: Do you have the book?
Today, I don't feel like doing anything.
It's Tom's birthday today.
Today is Tom's birthday.
Today's Tom's birthday.
That's what I want to ask.
I bought a slow cooker.
Tom looks very sleepy.
Tom, you look very sleepy.
I feel perfectly fine.
The stirrup rests on the oval window of the inner ear.
zh: 镫骨位于内耳的卵圆窗上。

en: I remember that place.
Where can I leave my bicycle?
zh: 我的自行车可以停在哪里？

en: Oh, hello. It's quite hot today really!
I was out of my depth in that debate.
zh: 在那场辩论中我感到力不从心。

en: The old dog barked.
When it came to the crunch she just gave in.
zh: 到了关键时刻，她就屈服了。

en: I'll give you one more chance.
I saw nothing at all.
She puts her own interests above everything else.
zh: 她把自己的利益置于一切之上。

en: In a quivering voice she cried "Help!"
zh: 她用颤抖的声音喊道：“救命啊！”

en: Tom had a strange dream last night.
zh: 汤姆昨晚做了一个奇怪的梦。

en: If you aren't careful, you'll fail again.
zh: 如果你不小心，你还会再次失败。

en: You don't have to go to the dance if you don't want to.
zh: 如果你不想去舞会，你不必去。

en: Tom dictated a letter to his secretary.
zh: 汤姆口述了一封信给他的秘书。

en: If I'd had more money, I'd have bought that pen.
zh: 如果我当时有更多的钱，我就会买那支钢笔。

en: If you act in such a childish way, then you will be treated as child.
zh: 如果你表现得如此幼稚，你就会被当成孩子对待。

en: I ask you to forgive me.
You sound like an idiot if you talk like this.
zh: 如果你这样说话，听起来像个白痴。

en: I run ten kilometers a day.
I run 10 kilometers every day.
I woke up with a headache this morning.
zh: 我今天早上醒来时头痛。

en: The people here are particular about what they eat, so even if a restaurant is inexpensive, it'll soon go out of business if the food doesn't taste good.
zh: 这里的人们对吃的东西很讲究，所以即使一家餐馆很便宜，如果食物不好吃，很快就会倒闭。

en: The bus stopped, but nobody got off.
zh: 公共汽车停了，但是没有人下车。

en: I can't say anything at this time.
The streets were overflowing with young couples.
zh: 街上到处都是年轻的情侣。

en: The neighborhood was full of young couples.
zh: 这个社区到处都是年轻的情侣。

en: It seems that the computer was infected by a virus.
My life would probably have been hugely different if I had been born a month later.
zh: 如果我晚一个月出生，我的人生可能会非常不同。

en: My life would probably have been quite different if I had been born a month later.
zh: 如果我晚一个月出生，我的人生可能会很不相同。

en: Darn it, I forgot my camera!
Oh no! I forgot my camera.
Tom majored in educational psychology.
zh: 汤姆的专业是教育心理学。

en: When I finally came home at 1 o'clock at night, my whole body was completely exhausted.
zh: 当我最终在晚上一点钟回到家时，我全身都筋疲力尽了。

en: Tom was expelled from school for breaking school rules.
zh: 汤姆因为违反校规而被学校开除了。

en: I'd like to go on a date wearing my school uniform while I'm still in high school.
zh: 我想在还在上高中的时候穿着校服去约会。

en: Keep your eyes closed until I say that you should open them.
zh: 在我说你可以睁开眼睛之前，请闭上你的眼睛。

en: Don't you trust your instincts?
At Tatoeba, it is more important that a translation sound natural than that it be strictly faithful to the original.
zh: 在Tatoeba，翻译听起来自然比严格忠实于原文更重要。

en: Is nobody else coming?
Tom is looking for work.
I was busy at work today so I didn't have the time to eat lunch.
zh: 我今天工作很忙，所以没时间吃午饭。

en: I'm looking forward to meeting you all after such a long time.
zh: 我期待着这么久之后和大家见面。

en: Can you take Tom to the hospital?
Below the starry sky, Tom and Mary forgot about time, recounting their dreams to each other.
zh: 在星空下，汤姆和玛丽忘记了时间，互相倾诉着他们的梦想。

en: "You're lucky! Your change comes to exactly 256 yen." "What do you mean by exactly?" "It's exactly two to the power of eight."
zh: “你真幸运！你找的零钱正好是256日元。”“你说的正好是什么意思？”“正好是2的8次方。”

en: A flag is a symbol of the nation.
zh: 国旗是一个国家的象征。

en: A flag is a symbol of the people.
I wasn't trying to do it on purpose.
zh: 我不是故意要那样做的。

en: My bad. Just so you know, it wasn't on purpose.
zh: 我的错。跟你说一声，我不是故意的。

en: I'm sorry. I didn't do it on purpose.
zh: 对不起，我不是故意那样做的。

en: There's only a couple of days left until our winter vacation.
zh: 离我们的寒假只有几天了。

en: Winter vacation is just around the corner.
A word once uttered can never be recalled.
A word once spoken can never be recalled.
Words once uttered cannot be recalled.
Words once said can't be taken back.
zh: 说出去的话，泼出去的水。

en: Once you've said something, it can't be taken back.
zh: 话说出口就收不回来了。

en: Words can't be taken back.
There seems to be a large number of people in Japan with high blood pressure.
zh: 日本似乎有很多人患有高血压。

en: Today was such a bad day.
Today was an awful day.
Today was a terrible day.
Tom presented his graduation thesis yesterday.
zh: 汤姆昨天做了毕业论文答辩。

en: Tom speaks English with a French accent.
zh: 汤姆说英语带着法国口音。

en: Tom speaks English with a strong French accent.
zh: 汤姆说英语带着很重的法国口音。

en: Tom speaks English with a heavy French accent.
zh: 汤姆说英语带着很重的法国口音。

en: On the whole, Tom has almost never been late.
zh: 总的来说，汤姆几乎从不迟到。

en: Tom is ironing his shirts.
What Tom said was besides the point.
Tom is shorter than Mary is.
Tom ran out of his house in a hurry.
zh: 汤姆匆匆忙忙地跑出了家门。

en: Tom frequently goes to Boston.
Tom goes to Boston a lot.
It looks like Tom is sleeping.
Tom appears to be sleeping.
zh: 汤姆看起来好像在睡觉。

en: I didn't like my name when I was young.
zh: 我小时候不喜欢我的名字。

en: You are right.
I have the ace of clubs.
Today it feels like hell is freezing over so its probably a good idea to dress for anything.
zh: 今天感觉好像地狱都要结冰了，所以最好做好应对任何天气的准备。

en: Let's play tag.
Do you want to play hide and seek?
She panicked when she was kissed by another man.
zh: 她被另一个男人亲吻时惊慌失措。

en: I can't imagine anybody would be surprised if Tom and Mary got married.
zh: 我无法想象如果汤姆和玛丽结婚，会有人感到惊讶。

en: Tom revealed the secret to Mary.
zh: 汤姆向玛丽透露了秘密。

en: I went to visit my grandfather's grave today.
zh: 我今天去拜访了我祖父的坟墓。

en: It seemed that Tom was hiding something.
zh: 看起来汤姆在隐瞒什么。

en: Did you return Tom's books?
Tom seemed to be looking for something.
zh: 汤姆好像在找什么东西。

en: It looked like Tom was searching for something.
zh: 看起来汤姆在寻找什么东西。

en: The cookies are in the jar.
You think too much!

I spent that day listening to the lonely scrapings of a pen. During that time, from time to time, I heard a Java sparrow twittering. It occurred to me that maybe Java sparrows twitter out of loneliness too. I walked out to the veranda to see. Nevertheless, flying to and fro between two perches busily and incessantly, it did not show the slightest hint of grievance.
zh: 那天我都在听笔尖孤独的刮擦声。在那段时间里，我不时听到一只文鸟在鸣叫。我突然想到，也许文鸟也是因为孤独才鸣叫的。我走到阳台上想看看。然而，它在两个栖木之间忙碌而不停地飞来飞去，丝毫没有表现出不满。

en: She suggested that I cancel the meeting.
Tom got on the elevator and pressed the button for the third floor.
zh: 汤姆走进电梯，按了三楼的按钮。

en: Tom put on his helmet and then got on his motorcycle.
zh: 汤姆戴上头盔，然后骑上了摩托车。

en: Tom just announced that he would be moving to Boston.
zh: 汤姆刚刚宣布他要搬到波士顿。

en: Tom took the orange juice out of the refrigerator.
zh: 汤姆从冰箱里拿出了橙汁。

en: Let me think about it and I'll get back to you.
Tom looked both ways before crossing the road.
zh: 汤姆过马路前左右看了看。

en: I shouldn't have stayed up so late last night.
zh: 我昨晚真不该熬夜熬那么晚。

en: Tom watches the 6 o'clock news every evening.
zh: 汤姆每天晚上都看六点的新闻。

en: I'm sure that dress will look good on Mary.
zh: 我肯定那件连衣裙玛丽穿会很好看。

en: I'm sure that shirt will look good on you.
zh: 我肯定那件衬衫你穿会很好看。

en: I'm not asking you to change your opinion.
zh: 我不是要你改变你的看法。

en: I wonder if you'd talk to us for a moment.
zh: 我想知道你是否能和我们谈一会儿。

en: I wonder if Tom ever gives Mary flowers.
zh: 我想知道汤姆会不会送花给玛丽。

en: I'm not particularly thirsty right now.
I wish I'd brought an umbrella with me.
I feel like we shouldn't be doing this.
zh: 我觉得我们不应该做这件事。

en: I'm looking forward to tomorrow night.
I was thinking exactly the same thing.
zh: 我当时也正是这么想的。

en: I wonder if this milk is still good.
zh: 我想知道这牛奶是否还新鲜。

en: I was thinking the exact same thing.
zh: 我当时也正是这么想的。

en: Tom would've done the same thing.
I'm trying not to think about that.
I'm really starting to get worried.
I'd have to be an idiot to do that.
zh: 我要是做那种事就是个白痴。

en: I told Tom that I'd get him a gift.
zh: 我告诉汤姆我会给他买个礼物。

en: You were the first one here today.
zh: 你是今天第一个到这儿的。

en: Tom asked Mary how John was doing.
zh: 汤姆问玛丽约翰怎么样了。

en: I'm going to ask Mary to marry me.
You're angry with me, aren't you?
What's your mother's maiden name?
zh: 你母亲的婚前姓是什么？

en: Tom would've loved the concert.
zh: 汤姆肯定会喜欢那场音乐会的。

en: The parking lot was almost empty.
I'm going to take a quick shower.
I wouldn't do it even if I could.
zh: 即使我能做到，我也不会做。

en: You've got no right to say that.
You shouldn't play with matches.
Whatever you do, don't tell Tom.
zh: 无论你做什么，都不要告诉汤姆。

en: Tom, you're wanted on the phone.
Tom is doing a crossword puzzle.
I was born and raised in Boston.
zh: 我在波士顿出生和长大。

en: You worked for Tom, didn't you?
zh: 你为汤姆工作过，不是吗？

en: Tom was hiding under the table.
It's good to be back in Boston.
I'm glad I could be of service.
We don't have a swimming pool.
Tom stopped what he was doing.
zh: 汤姆停下了他正在做的事情。

en: I'm sure they're on their way.
zh: 我确信他们正在赶来的路上。

en: I'm sorry, I meant no offence.
zh: 对不起，我没有冒犯的意思。

en: I'm aware of that possibility.
I'll be home as soon as I can.
I was thinking the same thing.
Do you know where my keys are?
zh: 你知道我的钥匙在哪里吗？

en: Your reputation precedes you.
Would you stop staring at me?
Tom was sitting on the floor.
Tom doesn't have any friends.
Tom answered Mary's question.
zh: 汤姆回答了玛丽的问题。

en: I'm not going to fool myself.
I wish I could've seen Tom.
zh: 我真希望我能见到汤姆。

en: We play basketball together.
Tom likes reading magazines.
Tom is a little disoriented.
I'm very unhappy about this.
I'm touched by your concern.
I'm really glad I came here.
zh: 我真的很高兴我来了这里。

en: I'm glad I was able to help.
I'm curious about one thing.
I'll be here if you need me.
zh: 如果你需要我，我会在这里。

en: I wonder why they chose Tom.
zh: 我想知道他们为什么选择汤姆。

en: Do you know what this means?
zh: 你知道这是什么意思吗？

en: I'm worried about Tom, too.
I'm sorry I frightened you.
I'm sorry for interrupting.
I wonder what Tom will say.
zh: 我想知道汤姆会说什么。

en: Did you say something, Tom?
You've walked into a trap.
Tom shut the kitchen door.
Tom put on his sunglasses.
zh: 汤姆戴上了他的太阳镜。

en: I'm just following orders.
I'm going to the restroom.
I'm going to the bathroom.
I'm glad I could help out.
I want to see how it ends.
Are you worried about Tom?
Are you going to tell Tom?
Tom tossed Mary the ball.
Tom jumped into the pool.
Tom barely said anything.
I'm too excited to sleep.
I'm starting to like you.
I'm sorry I let you down.
I'm going to pick Tom up.
I'll go and look for Tom.
I'd just like to go home.
I wasn't looking for Tom.
I want to come back here.
I took care of it myself.
Do you have a suggestion?
Tom turned on the radio.
No one knows the future.
I'm sorry if I hurt you.
zh: 如果我伤害了你，我很抱歉。

en: I'm sorry I doubted you.
I wonder where Tom went.
zh: 我想知道汤姆去哪儿了。

en: Tom loves his children.
I'm not hungry anymore.
I'm not angry with you.
I'm honored to be here.
I'll get a hold of you.
I'll call an ambulance.
You're not my brother.
We'll be here all day.
zh: 我们会在这里待一整天。

en: Tom waited until 2:30.
Tom tried not to yawn.
Tom had big blue eyes.
zh: 汤姆有双蓝色的大眼睛。

en: I'm sure Tom told you.
I'm not a kid anymore.
I'll keep it a secret.
Tom walked Mary home.
Tom sliced the onion.
Tom sliced the apple.
Tom screamed in pain.
Tom read it out loud.
Tom played the piano.
Tom peeled the apple.
Tom needed some food.
Tom is in a bad mood.
Tom is a hard worker.
Tom can fix anything.
This is the bathroom.
I'm setting Tom free.
I'm living in Boston.
I'm allergic to dogs.
I'm all out of money.
I was out for a walk.
I thought it was Tom.
What're you reading?
What was the matter?
Tom's room is empty.
Tom's room is dirty.
This is not a trick.
Please do your best.
I'm prepared to die.
I'll go get changed.
You have to choose.
Where're you going?
Tom talked to Mary.
Tom is very famous.
Tom is in his seat.
Tom forced a smile.
Tom became curious.
This is not my day.
The economy is bad.
I'm sorry you lost.
I'm glad you're OK.
I wrote it for Tom.
I wouldn't miss it.
I won't be coerced.
I won't assist you.
I wish you success.
I wish we had time.
Tom sneezes a lot.
Tom made a speech.
Tom is good at it.
I'm sorry I asked.
You have to wait.
Scary, wasn't it?
I'm out of shape.
I'm OK with that.
I'm not so brave.
I'm not like Tom.
I'm not her type.
I'm not a member.
I'm in my office.
I'm good at this.
I'm from the FBI.
I'm baking a pie.
I'm at the hotel.
I'm an adult now.
I'll try my best.
I'll pay my bill.
I'll go find Tom.
I'll do the rest.
I'll be punished.
I'll back you up.
I won't help you.
I won't be quiet.
I wish I'd known.
I was young once.
I was 13 in 2003.
I want to go out.
I want the truth.
I want some help.
I waited for Tom.
I waited an hour.
I told the truth.
I heard a scream.
How was the game?
How is the salad?
Have a seat, Tom.
Get in here, Tom.
Everyone had fun.
Can I borrow $30?
Breathe normally.
You're my woman.
You're my enemy.
You're bleeding.
You should quit.
You lied to Tom.
You have to eat.
You have cancer.
Why is Tom here?
Where's the key?
Where's the dog?
We're in a rush.
We want it back.
We love you all.
We have to wait.
We all love you.
We all love Tom.
Tom's my friend.
Tom's my cousin.
Tom went to bed.
Tom wasn't rich.
Tom was pleased.
Tom was in love.
Tom lit a match.
Tom has rabbits.
I hate tomatoes.
Crows are black.
Wipe your feet.
Why is Tom wet?
Tom loves cats.
I'm not a baby.
I'm mad at Tom.
I was an idiot.
I was a member.
I travel a lot.
I'm unmarried.
I'm not a kid.
Keep up, Tom.
Just say yes.
Tom shouted.
It was cold.
It cost $30.
I won't cry.
Call me Tom.
You've won.
I miss Tom.
I did it.
You won.
Hi, Tom.
Tom is a distant relative of mine.

en: How many innocent civilians were killed in Hiroshima and Nagasaki?
zh: 在广岛和长崎有多少无辜平民被杀？

en: I'd like you to understand.
He didn't want to talk about it anymore.
Thanks for your advice.
My involvement with her left me a physical and mental wreck.
zh: 我和她的关系让我身心俱疲。

en: Every type of socialization requires a lie.
zh: 每一种社交都需要谎言。

en: Proceed.
We did it.
Tom mastered French studying by himself.
Tom learned French perfectly studying by himself.
zh: 汤姆自学把法语学得很完美。

en: Tom lives alone with his parents.
zh: 汤姆和他父母住在一起，但他独自生活。

en: Tom is only a little older than Mary.
It has been almost 4 years since Tom passed away in a car accident.
zh: 汤姆在车祸中去世已经快四年了。

en: It's been almost four years since Tom died in a traffic accident.
zh: 汤姆死于交通事故已经快四年了。

en: Tom missed the last train and spent the night at an Internet cafe.
zh: 汤姆错过了末班车，在网吧过了一夜。

en: How old is your dog?
Tom and Mary have a long distance relationship.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽谈的是异地恋。

en: He loves his own children.
What languages do you speak, Tom?
What languages does Tom speak?
I wouldn't regret this later.
Who's next?
When his wife died he was full of heartrending grief.
zh: 他妻子去世时，他悲痛欲绝。

en: There was a handwritten note on the door.
zh: 门上有一张手写的便条。

en: It's embarrassing, but I've never read Tolstoy.
zh: 很不好意思，但我从来没读过托尔斯泰的作品。

en: I, too, wanted to ask that the whole time.
zh: 我也一直想问这个问题。

en: Tom hugged Mary from behind.
zh: 汤姆从背后抱住了玛丽。

en: "I love being told I'm cute", said Tom, a little embarrassed.
zh: “我喜欢别人说我可爱，”汤姆有点不好意思地说。

en: If you're not motivated, go back home. You'll just be a hindrance.
zh: 如果你没有动力，就回家吧。你只会碍事。

en: I couldn't stand it anymore.
She's rich, young and beautiful.
He's rich, young and handsome.
I'll admit that.
You can walk.
He can walk.
She can walk.
We can walk.
They can walk.
It can walk.
It's one of the largest cities in the world.
zh: 它是世界上最大的城市之一。

en: I thought nothing of it.
When I grow up, I want to be a firefighter.
zh: 我长大后想当一名消防员。

en: What is your favorite animal?
zh: 你最喜欢的动物是什么？

en: What do you know about Israel?
Are you still awake?
Tom left the umbrella on the bus.
zh: 汤姆把伞忘在公交车上了。

en: I was impolite.
I'll solve that problem.
Things didn't work out between Tom and Mary.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽之间没有结果。

en: You carry too much stuff in your purse.
zh: 你的钱包里装的东西太多了。

en: Is he still mad?
Is she still mad?
Tom's clothes are out of fashion.
We've got to find him before he does something stupid.
zh: 我们必须在他做傻事之前找到他。

en: When I grow up, I want to be a fireman.
zh: 我长大后想当一名消防员。

en: Fibre-optic cables can carry huge amounts of information.
zh: 光缆可以传输大量信息。

en: I really love French things.
zh: 我真的很喜欢法国的东西。

en: I love France.
I love the French.
I love French culture.
It was a strange beast.
His great performance drew thundering applause from the audience.
zh: 他精彩的表演赢得了观众雷鸣般的掌声。

en: Recently I've been feeling a bit down.
May I begin?
Is it OK if we begin?
Leave it to us.
Tom fell and hit his elbow.
zh: 汤姆摔倒了，撞到了他的胳膊肘。

en: There's one thing I don't understand.
Oh, Mary! Tom was just looking for you.
zh: 哦，玛丽！汤姆只是在找你。

en: Tom can say "I can only speak French" in thirty languages.
zh: 汤姆可以用三十种语言说“我只会说法语”。

en: Tom is able to say "I can only speak French" in thirty languages.
zh: 汤姆可以用三十种语言说“我只会说法语”。

en: Only looks and money count in this world.
zh: 这个世界只看外貌和金钱。

en: Did we win?
Did he win?
Did she win?
Did they win?
Why do you care?
Do you really care why I quit smoking?
zh: 你真的在乎我为什么戒烟吗？

en: Do you really care when I get this done as long as I get it done?
zh: 你真的在乎我什么时候完成这件事吗？只要我完成就行？

en: Do you really care what I think?
zh: 你真的在乎我是怎么想的吗？

en: Do you care who helps us?
Do you care where we go?
Do you care when we leave?
zh: 你在乎我们什么时候离开吗？

en: Do you care what other people think?
Do you care what other people think about you?
zh: 你在乎别人怎么看你吗？

en: Do you care what kind of music we listen to?
zh: 你在乎我们听什么类型的音乐吗？

en: Do you care how much it costs?
zh: 你在乎它要花多少钱吗？

en: Do not delete this example sentence.
Is it really important to you why I quit smoking?
zh: 你真的觉得我为什么戒烟这件事很重要吗？

en: I have reached my limits.
Where there's good, there's also bad.
zh: 有好的一面，也有坏的一面。

en: Can you give motivation to people using the carrot and the stick?
zh: 你能用胡萝卜加大棒的方式激励人们吗？

en: Can you motivate people with "candies and the whip"?
zh: 你能用“糖果和鞭子”来激励人们吗？

en: They picked out the best two works.
zh: 他们挑选出了最好的两件作品。

en: They vacationed together.
Who is Tom?

My Latin teacher used to look down sternly on me over the rim of her glasses, but now I know it only had to do with the fact that she was wearing reading glasses and that she will have found it a nuisance taking them off all the time, so what looked like contempt towards us students might well and truly have been kindness.
zh: 我的拉丁语老师过去常常从眼镜上方严厉地看着我，但现在我知道这只是因为她戴着老花镜，而且她会觉得一直摘下眼镜很麻烦，所以看起来像是对我们学生的蔑视，很可能实际上是善意。

en: Don't you want to know why I didn't do that?
zh: 你不想知道我为什么没那么做吗？

en: I don't think I could spend six hours alone with you.
zh: 我想我无法和你单独相处六个小时。

en: I want to show you something in my office.
zh: 我想在我的办公室给你看点东西。

en: That's pretty normal.
I'm tired and I want to go home.
Aren't you able to speak French?
It's about my brother. Lately, he's been hanging out with the wrong sort of people. Don't you know anything about it?
zh: 是关于我弟弟的事。最近，他一直和一些不三不四的人混在一起。你一点都不知道吗？

en: This dictionary is nearly useless.
Tom seemed like he was about to burst into tears any minute.
zh: 汤姆看起来好像随时都要哭出来一样。

en: He's quite handsome, isn't he?
That attitude of his is quite disgusting.
zh: 他的那种态度真令人厌恶。

en: I don't want to go to the pool.
Your login attempt was not successful. Please try again.
zh: 您的登录尝试不成功。请重试。

en: A password is required.
Remember me next time.
Your attempt to retrieve your password was not successful. Please try again.
zh: 您找回密码的尝试不成功。请重试。

en: Answer the following question to receive your password.
zh: 回答以下问题以接收您的密码。

en: The email address you entered is already in use.
zh: 您输入的电子邮件地址已被使用。

en: Please enter a valid email address.
zh: 请输入有效的电子邮件地址。

en: I want to become a musician.
You should rest a little bit longer.
zh: 你应该再多休息一会儿。

en: I want to clarify in further research to what extent the conclusions of this paper can be generalized.
zh: 我想在进一步的研究中阐明这篇论文的结论可以在多大程度上推广。

en: What if Tom hadn't heard my voice at that time? What in the world would have happened? Just thinking about it gives me the chills.
zh: 如果当时汤姆没有听到我的声音会怎么样？到底会发生什么事？光是想想就让我不寒而栗。

en: Tom and Mary are often together.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽经常在一起。

en: Tom normally doesn't show his feelings very much.
zh: 汤姆通常不太表露他的感情。

en: Tom didn't want to be seen with Mary.
zh: 汤姆不想和玛丽一起被人看到。

en: I don't want to talk to anybody today.
zh: 我今天不想和任何人说话。

en: Tom stayed single his whole life.
Tom was a bachelor all his life.
zh: 汤姆一生都是个单身汉。

en: If you were to start your life over again, to what time in your life would you like to go back?
zh: 如果让你重新开始你的人生，你最想回到你人生的哪个阶段？

en: If you were to remake your life , to what age would you like to go back?
zh: 如果可以重来，你最想回到几岁？

en: The fruiting season for the cherry trees is from June to July.
zh: 樱桃树的結果期是六月到七月。

en: Why do you love an idiot like me?
zh: 你为什么会爱上像我这样的傻瓜？

en: There was once a time when men were forced to act manly and women forced to act in a feminine manner.
zh: 曾经有一段时间，男人被迫表现得像个男人，女人被迫表现得很有女人味。

en: My father painted the wall white.
zh: 我爸爸把墙漆成了白色。

en: The teacher and the students are at the art museum.
zh: 老师和学生们在美术馆。

en: Flawless precision is required in the measurements.
Is that what Tom would want?
What I'm going to do is study French.
The thing I'm planning to do is study French.
zh: 我计划要做的事情是学习法语。

en: Thanks for waiting for me.
Tom's happy.
Mary is a mom.
Drivers must stop at the stop line.
zh: 司机必须在停止线前停车。

en: At the ethics committee, a temporary halt to cloning experiments was decided.
zh: 在伦理委员会上，决定暂时停止克隆实验。

en: What does a Sovietologist study?
zh: 苏联问题专家研究什么？

en: By the way, have you heard about Suzuki?
zh: 对了，你听说铃木的事了吗？

en: We shouted for help at the tops of our voices.
The police were watching Yamada's movements.
zh: 警察在监视山田的动向。

en: The colour drained from her face at the news of the traffic accident.
zh: 听到交通事故的消息，她脸色苍白。

en: Our store has a monopoly on this item.
zh: 我们店垄断了这种商品。

en: I had to fill the gap left when our head clerk quit on short notice.
zh: 我不得不填补我们主任突然辞职留下的空缺。

en: Among my acquaintances are many Japanese-speaking Americans.
zh: 我的熟人中有很多会说日语的美国人。

en: Tom lost his appetite due to the heat wave.
zh: 汤姆因为热浪而失去了食欲。

en: Tom lost his wife seven years ago.
zh: 汤姆七年前失去了他的妻子。

en: Tom lost his only son in a car accident.
zh: 汤姆在一次车祸中失去了他唯一的儿子。

en: Tom broke his left ankle during a rugby match.
zh: 汤姆在一场橄榄球比赛中摔断了他的左脚踝。

en: You're always all talk and no action!
Tom no longer lives in Boston.
zh: 汤姆已经不住在波士顿了。

en: Tom encountered Mary for the first time three years ago.
zh: 三年前，汤姆第一次遇到了玛丽。

en: Tom met Mary for the first time three years ago.
zh: 三年前，汤姆第一次见到了玛丽。

en: Tom gave Mary his phone number.
zh: 汤姆把他的电话号码给了玛丽。

en: Tom had his wisdom teeth removed.
Tom has never eaten horse meat carpaccio.
zh: 汤姆从来没有吃过马肉刺身。

en: Tom disregarded Mary's advice completely.
zh: 汤姆完全无视了玛丽的建议。

en: Tom is 3 years older than Mary.
Tom's trying to make the impossible possible.
zh: 汤姆正试图使不可能变为可能。

en: Tom is trying to make the impossible possible.
zh: 汤姆正试图使不可能变为可能。

en: Tom showed up 15 minutes late.
I like this school.
In the amusement park Mary found a boy on his own weeping, and spoke to him gently. "Hey, sonny, what is it? Are you lost? Would you like me to take you to the Lost Children Department?"
zh: 在游乐园里，玛丽发现一个男孩独自一人在哭泣，便温柔地对他说：“嘿，孩子，你怎么了？你迷路了吗？要不要我带你去失物招领处？”

en: I have no siblings.
I don't have any siblings.
Tom was the only guy in the class.
zh: 汤姆是班里唯一的男生。

en: Oh, look! There's a big snake over there!
My car is red.
Ken threw a sushi party at his house.
zh: 肯在他家举办了一个寿司派对。

en: I was at home yesterday.
I bought a T-shirt.
I broke my gas-powered rice cooker so I got an induction rice cooker instead.
zh: 我把燃气电饭煲弄坏了，所以换了一个电磁电饭煲。

en: My body still hurts, but that multi-day holiday trip was super fun!
zh: 我身上还是很痛，但是那次多日假期旅行超级好玩！

en: My husband caught a cold and he's resting in bed.
zh: 我丈夫感冒了，他在床上休息。

en: Tom went to Japan on a work holiday visa.
zh: 汤姆持工作度假签证去了日本。

en: This washing machine is compact and good value for money.
zh: 这台洗衣机很紧凑，而且物超所值。

en: Don't you think that Ronald Mcdonald is a bit creepy?
zh: 你不觉得罗纳德·麦当劳有点吓人吗？

en: Are you still angry?
Are you still mad?
Are they still mad?
Are they still angry?
Is he still angry?
Is she still angry?
Geez, I wish this test would finish soon.
zh: 哎呀，我真希望这个考试快点结束。

en: The men's room is on the second floor.
"It's raining horribly hard. You didn't get wet?" "No, I'm okay."
zh: “雨下得太大了。你没淋湿吗？” “没有，我没事。”

en: Both Tom and Mary like old movies.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽都喜欢老电影。

en: Try again!
Mary'd be cute if she'd just shut up. Her way of speaking really gets on my nerves.
zh: 如果玛丽闭嘴的话，她会很可爱的。她说话的方式真让我心烦。

en: I'm calling from Tom's place.
That's a lovely necklace.
The sum of the angles of a triangle on a spherical plane is more than 180 degrees.
zh: 球面三角形的内角和大于180度。

en: I'd like to hear Tom's opinion at least once before we come to a conclusion.
zh: 在得出结论之前，我至少想听一次汤姆的意见。

en: Tom and Mary are considering divorce.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽正在考虑离婚。

en: Tom and Mary are thinking about divorce.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽正在考虑离婚。

en: Have you ever listened to the French version of this opera?
zh: 你有没有听过这个歌剧的法语版本？

en: Tom is a lazy person.
I want a piece of pie.
I want a piece of cake.
Tom is more than my friend, but he's not quite my boyfriend.
zh: 汤姆比朋友更亲密，但还算不上我的男朋友。

en: Tom is the kind of person who is deeply conscious of how other people think of him.
zh: 汤姆非常在意别人对他的看法。

en: Tom wrote down without fail every one of Mary's words.
zh: 汤姆一字不落地记下了玛丽说的每一句话。

en: The piano in Tom's house is out of tune.
We have already passed the peak of the summer heat, but it's still hot during the day.
zh: 我们已经过了最热的时候，但白天还是很热。

en: The fireworks show was suspended after 30 minutes due to the thunderstorm.
zh: 烟花表演因为雷暴雨在三十分钟后暂停了。

en: Please return to your seats and fasten your seatbelts.
zh: 请回到座位上并系好安全带。

en: Tom is the same age as me.
The Imari porcelain plate that my father cherished was quite heavy.
zh: 我父亲珍爱的伊万里瓷盘很重。

en: The song played by that blind pianist really moved me.
zh: 那位盲人钢琴家演奏的歌曲真让我感动。

en: You say that your savings are piling up and you have no way of spending them? That's really an extravagant kind of worry to have.
zh: 你说你的存款堆积如山，没地方花？这真是奢侈的烦恼啊。

en: The king is naked!
Tom's not asleep.
Tom isn't asleep.
That's wrong!
I watched a documentary.
I live with my uncle.
I love you Mary!
Mary, I love you.
Tom, where are you? Everyone's looking for you!
zh: 汤姆，你在哪里？大家都在找你！

en: I answered.
"Are you happy to be alive?" "Yes, I'm happy."
zh: “你活着感到幸福吗？”“是的，我感到幸福。”

en: You can see the Skytree from there.
zh: 从那里你可以看到晴空塔。

en: I have a green shirt.
Tom has no children.
Tom doesn't have any kids.
Tom doesn't have any brothers or sisters.
Tom has no brothers.
I know what we can do.
I need to send a fax.
I need to make a copy.
You have beautiful hair.
I talk a lot.
I need colored pencils.
Is the pencil long?
I burned the paper.
I want to leave school.
I'll wait here until he returns.
Love is an important thing.
I need a mouse pad.
Europe is a continent.
I just want to hug you.
I got up a minute ago.
I have a red bicycle.
zh: 我有一辆红色的自行车。

en: I have a credit card.
Hassan went to school.
Do you want to see me?
I need to go to Chicago.
I'm not a boy anymore.
Tom got mad.
Tom got fat.
I'm in Dubai.
She ate the apple.
I drank the water.
I want the red balloon.
zh: 我想要那个红色的气球。

en: Tom took off his wedding ring and threw it into the pond.
zh: 汤姆摘下他的结婚戒指，把它扔进了池塘里。

en: Why are you wearing a raincoat? It's not raining, is it?
zh: 你为什么穿着雨衣？没下雨，对吧？

en: Tom used the key Mary had given him to open the door.
zh: 汤姆用玛丽给他的钥匙打开了门。

en: I want to thank you for picking Tom up after school.
zh: 我想感谢你放学后接汤姆。

en: Nobody is in the living room, but the TV is on.
zh: 客厅里没有人，但是电视开着。

en: It's been a long time since I've felt this bad.
zh: 我已经很久没有感觉这么糟糕了。

en: I think you were better looking with long hair.
zh: 我觉得你留长发更好看。

en: Tom opened the safe and took out his passport.
zh: 汤姆打开保险箱，取出了他的护照。

en: Tom picked up the phone and started talking.
zh: 汤姆拿起电话开始说话。

en: Tom took Mary's arm and they started walking.
zh: 汤姆挽着玛丽的手臂，他们开始走路。

en: Tom seems to be having a little difficulty.
zh: 汤姆似乎遇到了一点困难。

en: Tom and Mary left through different doors.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽从不同的门离开了。

en: Tom said that somebody here needed help.
zh: 汤姆说这里有人需要帮助。

en: Tom left here about thirty minutes ago.
zh: 汤姆大约三十分钟前离开了这里。

en: Tom left a message saying he'd be late.
zh: 汤姆留了条消息说他会迟到。

en: Tom and Mary were dancing to the music.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽在随着音乐跳舞。

en: There has to be another way to do this.
zh: 一定有另一种方法来做这件事。

en: Tom and Mary were both born in Boston.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽都出生在波士顿。

en: Neither Tom nor Mary can speak French.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽都不会说法语。

en: Tom put some flowers on Mary's grave.
zh: 汤姆在玛丽的坟墓上放了一些花。

en: Tom is one of the singers in my band.
zh: 汤姆是我乐队里的歌手之一。

en: Tom is in the kitchen washing dishes.
Tom and Mary got married last spring.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽去年春天结婚了。

en: Tom is the one with the car, not me.
Tom took control of the situation.
Tom set his alarm clock for 2:30.
zh: 汤姆把闹钟设在两点半。

en: Tom knew Mary didn't know French.
zh: 汤姆知道玛丽不懂法语。

en: Tom and Mary are waiting outside.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽在外面等着。

en: Do you know where Tom was hiding?
zh: 你知道汤姆躲在哪里吗？

en: What've you been doing recently?
Have you ever seen Tom's mother?
Do you understand the situation?
Tom walked away from the group.
Tom told me he was really busy.
zh: 汤姆告诉我他真的很忙。

en: You said that Tom wasn't busy.
You need a good night's sleep.
What're you doing in my house?
What were you doing in Boston?
Tom says he doesn't know Mary.
Tom always wears blue shirts.
Did Tom say when he'd arrive?
zh: 汤姆说了他什么时候到吗？

en: Are you saying Tom is a liar?
zh: 你是说汤姆是个骗子吗？

en: We'll start this afternoon.
Tom is feeling much better.
Haven't you been listening?
Have you ever seen a ghost?
Boston is a wonderful city.
zh: 波士顿是个很棒的城市。

en: You must be very busy now.
What did you do in Boston?
Tom repeated his question.
Tom kept his eyes on Mary.
zh: 汤姆的眼睛一直盯着玛丽。

en: Tom is wearing sunglasses.
Tom and Mary are fighting.
Does Tom have to be there?
Do you have Tom's address?
You three are very lucky.
Where have you been, Tom?
What are you insinuating?
We need a new babysitter.
zh: 我们需要一个新的保姆。

en: Tom looked up at the sky.
Tom isn't doing anything.
Tom blew out the candles.
Tom actually seems happy.
zh: 汤姆看起来真的很高兴。

en: Thank you for your reply.
Are you worried about me?
You handled that deftly.
Tom's house was on fire.
Tom looks really guilty.
zh: 汤姆看起来真的很内疚。

en: Tom has already started.
Tom fell into the water.
Tom and Mary seem happy.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽看起来很幸福。

en: Thanks for your concern.
Do you remember my name?
What're you looking at?
Tom was a little drunk.
Tom wanted to meet you.
Tom liked working here.
Tom found new evidence.
Thank you for the help.
Have you done anything?
Do you believe in fate?
Aren't you hungry, Tom?
Are you Tom's daughter?
You never believed me.
Why are they laughing?
What're you doing now?
What Tom said is true.
Tom took off his coat.
Tom suppressed a yawn.
Tom killed the engine.
Tom did nothing wrong.
Are these Tom's shoes?
Who said that to you?
What are you drawing?
Tom kept his promise.
Tom isn't lying down.
Tom got off his bike.
It isn't Tom's fault.
How is that relevant?
Why are you so busy?
What are you making?
Tom never asked why.
zh: 汤姆从来没有问为什么。

en: Thanks for the book.
Just do this for me.
Is everybody hungry?
Do you have a house?
Who is your friend?
Tom isn't like you.
Tom drew the sword.
Thank you for this.
Thank you for that.
You need to sleep.
Who is Tom anyway?
We met in college.
Tom relaxed a bit.
Did you pick this?
Did Tom seem busy?
We met in Boston.
Tom was at home.
Tom phoned Mary.
See you at 2:30.
It's not a game.
Is Tom for real?
I'm very sleepy.
Are you OK, Tom?
What do we owe?
Sing us a song.
My name's Tom.
Tom sneezed.
Is Tom busy?
Go to bed.
It hurts.
I hope you understand that.
We work in a factory.
I can eat.
I have to eat.
I have to drink.
I need printer paper.
I drank the coffee.
I really miss you all.
I hear someone coming.
Will you shut your trap for a minute?
I must do my homework.
Climate change is real.
zh: 气候变化是真实存在的。

en: "Um, what day was it today again?" "August 5th."
zh: “嗯，今天星期几来着？”“八月五号。”

en: Tom put on his socks.
Tom put his socks on.
Tom removed his socks.
Tom took off his socks.
Tom took his socks off.
Last night, the temperature went down to ten degrees below zero.
zh: 昨晚，气温降到了零下十度。

en: The temperature went down to minus ten degrees centigrade last night.
zh: 昨晚气温降到了零下十摄氏度。

en: My grandfather rarely talked about the war.
During an interview after the game, the coach voiced his discontent towards the umpire.
zh: 在赛后采访中，教练表达了他对裁判的不满。

en: What's the difference between fermentation and putrescence?
zh: 发酵和腐烂有什么区别？

en: Chinese is always harder than any other language.
zh: 中文总是比其他任何语言都难。

en: I like eating seafood.
The clear and refreshing sound of the wind chimes is one of the characteristics of summers in Japan, but in recent years the number of people who perceive it merely as noise has been increasing.
zh: 清澈凉爽的风铃声是日本夏天的特征之一，但近年来，越来越多的人仅仅把它当作噪音。

en: I love dogs so I often go to the park with my dog.
zh: 我喜欢狗，所以我经常和我的狗去公园。

en: Truth alone triumphs.
I have enough money.
I learned it by heart.
Tom has already fallen asleep.
Tom has already gone to sleep.
Tom already ate.
When the jet flew over the building the windowpanes rattled.
zh: 当喷气式飞机飞过建筑物时，窗玻璃嘎嘎作响。

en: Going to bed early and waking up early is very good both for your health and appearance.
zh: 早睡早起对你的健康和外貌都非常好。

en: Tom has had no interest in other people since he was a child.
zh: 汤姆从小就对其他人没有兴趣。

en: The washing machine is making a strange sound.
zh: 洗衣机发出奇怪的声音。

en: I hope my part-time job ends early today.
zh: 我希望我今天的兼职能早点结束。

en: Perhaps I'll make some candy today.
zh: 也许我今天会做些糖果。

en: Shall we make candy or something today?
zh: 我们今天要做糖果还是什么呢？

en: I want to become a kinder person.
zh: 我想成为一个更善良的人。

en: I forgot to eat lunch, so let's eat dinner early.
zh: 我忘了吃午饭，所以我们早点吃晚饭吧。

en: I don't want to meet anyone for a while and I don't want to go outside either.
zh: 我暂时不想见任何人，也不想出门。

en: Tom and Mary are playing in the park making soap bubbles.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽在公园里玩耍，吹着肥皂泡。

en: Have you ever eaten insects?
I went to the hospital.
I just got to the station. I'll be waiting for you at the library.
zh: 我刚到车站。我会在图书馆等你。

en: There's also a toilet on the fourth floor.
There is also a toilet on the fourth floor.
There is a toilet on the fourth floor, too.
Oh, I just remembered. The library's closed tomorrow.
zh: 哦，我想起来了。图书馆明天关门。

en: Please be careful not to forget your card or your change in the machine.
zh: 请小心不要把卡或零钱忘在机器里。

en: Is there anything else I can help you with?
zh: 还有什么我可以帮您的吗？

en: This university was founded in 1843.
Tom wants to go by train.
I have no idea what's causing these problems.
zh: 我不知道是什么导致了这些问题。

en: We must deal with this problem right away.
zh: 我们必须立即处理这个问题。

en: Call me if you have a problem.
zh: 如果你有问题，就给我打电话。

en: What's the problem now, Tom?
zh: 汤姆，现在又有什么问题？

en: This is not our problem.
With that big salary you're getting I guess you've saved up quite a lot.
zh: 你拿着那么高的工资，我想你一定存了不少钱吧。

en: Walking on a train platform while distracted is very dangerous.
zh: 在火车站台上分心行走非常危险。

en: Tom has two French dictionaries.
Tom has three French dictionaries.
"Sorry," said Tom with a tear in his eye.
We should have gone on a day that wasn't so hot.
zh: 我们应该在不那么热的一天去。

en: We should have gone on a cooler day.
zh: 我们应该在凉快一点的一天去。

en: At this restaurant, you eat spaghetti with chopsticks.
zh: 在这家餐厅，你用筷子吃意大利面。

en: I'm 24 years old and I haven't had a boyfriend in 6 years.
zh: 我24岁了，已经6年没有男朋友了。

en: I want to do something that I can't do if I'm not pressed for time.
zh: 我想做一些如果我不赶时间就做不了的事情。

en: He has no ability to reason logically at all.
zh: 他完全没有逻辑推理能力。

en: If I'm reincarnated, I want to come back as a cat.
zh: 如果我能转世，我想变成一只猫。

en: There's a large gingko tree that's said to be 800 years old inside the grounds of a nearby shrine.
zh: 附近的神社里有一棵据说有800年树龄的大银杏树。

en: The soft afternoon sun came in through the branches of the tree and then the window.
zh: 柔和的午后阳光透过树枝和窗户照进来。

en: Mom, Tom ate my cookie.
zh: 妈妈，汤姆吃了我的饼干。

en: Tom always makes a funny face when I point the camera at him.
zh: 当我把相机对准汤姆时，他总是做鬼脸。

en: Tom has become incapable of loving himself.
zh: 汤姆已经变得无法爱自己了。

en: Wait, what are you doing here?
Wait, why are you here?
Do you believe in miracles?
Tom displayed the contents of his wallet.
zh: 汤姆展示了他的钱包里的东西。

en: If you feel like crying, you should cry to your heart's content.
zh: 如果你想哭，你应该尽情地哭。

en: I will go to the school tomorrow.
I open the door.
I can't stop shaking my leg.
I feel like I'm always being watched.
zh: 我觉得我总是被监视着。

en: Thanks for pointing this out.
Don't make such a mean face.
"I'm afraid of having eye surgery." "It's no time to be saying that kind of thing. At this rate, you might lose your vision completely."
zh: “我害怕做眼部手术。” “现在不是说这种话的时候。 照这样下去，你可能会完全失明。”

en: "I'm afraid of having eye surgery." "It's no time to be saying that kind of thing. At this rate, you might lose your eyesight."
zh: “我害怕做眼部手术。” “现在不是说这种话的时候。 照这样下去，你可能会失去视力。”

en: I'd rather live happily in the present than go down in history.
zh: 我宁愿活在当下，开开心心的，也不想名垂青史。

en: Tom started talking to his girlfriend about breaking up.
zh: 汤姆开始和他的女朋友谈分手的事。

en: At that time, I thought that I was going to die for real.
zh: 那时候，我真的以为自己要死了。

en: I hate silent movies.
Tom retired at 65.
Tom retired when he was 65.
I have become disgusted of living.
Whenever I lie down on my bed and read a book, I fall asleep.
zh: 每当我躺在床上看书，我就会睡着。

en: Tom wanted to be able to read the original Quran and solely for that reason he started learning Arabic.
zh: 汤姆想读古兰经原文，仅仅因为这个原因，他开始学习阿拉伯语。

en: I wonder if there's some way of attracting more Japanese speakers to Tatoeba?
zh: 我想知道有没有什么办法能吸引更多的日语使用者来Tatoeba？

en: I need those shoes.
Tom believes in traditional gender roles.
zh: 汤姆信奉传统的性别角色。

en: Tom believes that men should rule over women.
zh: 汤姆认为男人应该统治女人。

en: Tom believes in a patriarchal society.
Find this function's global maximum and global minimum.
zh: 求出这个函数的全局最大值和全局最小值。

en: Tom is a language genius who speaks 10 languages fluently, but he's really bad at maths and can't even solve a simple first-order equation.
zh: 汤姆是个语言天才，能流利地说10种语言，但他数学很差，甚至连一个简单的一阶方程都解不出来。

en: Isn't there an old bakery somewhere in this town?
zh: 这个镇上是不是有个老面包店？

en: Tom confessed his love to me yesterday and we have started dating.
zh: 汤姆昨天向我表白了，我们开始约会了。

en: Mary is a mother of two.
zh: 玛丽是两个孩子的母亲。

en: It's better if you take what Tom says with a grain of salt.
zh: 你最好对汤姆说的话持保留态度。

en: Are they sleeping?
Do you have a book?
Aren't you frightened?
I think that we should take what Tom said earlier with a grain of salt.
zh: 我认为我们应该对汤姆之前说的话持保留态度。

en: Tatoeba is a project centered on Earthlings—it still only has one alien language on it.
zh: Tatoeba是一个以地球人为中心的项目——它目前只有一个外星语言。

en: Tom the Saturnian decided to set out for Venus over summer break to meet Mary the Venusian, who he met on Twitter.
zh: 土星人汤姆决定在暑假期间前往金星，去见他在推特上认识的金星人玛丽。

en: Tom's voice is so sexy! It really makes my chest tight!
zh: 汤姆的声音太性感了！真的让我心跳加速！

en: I've had a runny nose for two days and I've been feeling an uncomfortable sensation in my throat.
zh: 我已经流了两天鼻涕了，而且我感觉喉咙不舒服。

en: Tom, you're really cute so, I think you would blend in perfectly at an all-girls school.
zh: 汤姆，你真的很可爱，所以，我想你完全可以融入女子学校。

en: Life is made of encounters and partings.
zh: 人生是由相遇和离别构成的。

en: Mary's daughter died in an accident.
zh: 玛丽的女儿在一次事故中去世了。

en: Mary likes doing different things from other people.
zh: 玛丽喜欢做和别人不一样的事情。

en: There's nothing more painful than losing one's loved child.
zh: 没有什么比失去自己心爱的孩子更痛苦的了。

en: Tom was finally able to buy himself a home, as he had long desired.
zh: 汤姆终于能够给自己买一套房子了，正如他一直渴望的那样。

en: Don't complain about it. You've asked for it.
zh: 别抱怨了。这是你自找的。

en: It was really fun.
The teacher made the students do a lot of homework.
zh: 老师让学生们做了很多作业。

en: That manager often makes "people" work long hours.
zh: 那位经理经常让“人们”长时间工作。

en: May I use the restroom?
zh: 我可以借用一下洗手间吗？

en: Don't make me say the same thing over and over again!
zh: 别让我一遍又一遍地说同样的话！

en: I'm told by everybody that I am strange.
Do you have problems in losing weight?
The Brothers Grimm collected fairy tales all-over Germany.
zh: 格林兄弟在德国各地收集童话故事。

en: The tree bore golden apples.
We went to London.
Tom, you have really taught me many things.
zh: 汤姆，你真的教会了我很多东西。

en: Tom has really taught me many things.
zh: 汤姆真的教了我很多东西。

en: I have truly learned many things from Tom.
zh: 我真的从汤姆那里学到了很多东西。

en: Your mental age is too low.
Are you mad at me?
Tom died because of me.
Nobody else can know.
Tom can't write yet.
Tom can't read yet.
Tom still can't read.
The printer had a paper jam.
Tom eats a lot despite appearances.
zh: 汤姆看起来不怎么样，但吃得很多。

en: Every detail of his writing is carefully composed.
zh: 他写作的每个细节都经过精心构思。

en: For a business owner, having a clear overview of one's entire business is vital.
zh: 对于企业主来说，清楚地了解整个业务至关重要。

en: Tom bought a new multifunction printer.
zh: 汤姆买了一台新的多功能打印机。

en: Tom and his friends use the school printer every month to print the student bulletin.
zh: 汤姆和他的朋友们每个月都用学校的打印机打印学生公告。

en: When Tom translates one of my sentences, I feel glad to be alive.
zh: 当汤姆翻译我的句子时，我感到活着真好。

en: Recently, Tom hasn't been translating my sentences. Does he hate me?
zh: 最近，汤姆一直没有翻译我的句子。他讨厌我吗？

en: There are 16 characters named Tom in this novel.
zh: 这本小说里有16个名叫汤姆的角色。

en: That's super easy.
Piece of cake!
As long as it's not too much of a bother, people like to be nice to other people.
zh: 只要不是太麻烦，人们都喜欢对别人好。

en: I'm not in the mood to watch TV this evening.
I made too many cookies, so won't you take some?
zh: 我做了太多的饼干，你拿一些走吧？

en: If I could, I would love to experience once again a bittersweet love like in middle school.
zh: 如果可以的话，我很想再次体验一次像中学时代那样苦乐参半的爱情。

en: After her first date with Tom, Mary was distracted all day, couldn't concentrate on her classes and didn't feel hungry.
zh: 在和汤姆第一次约会后，玛丽整天心神不宁，上课无法集中注意力，也不觉得饿。

en: At last, the rain stopped.
Can you stop talking loudly on the phone at night?
zh: 你晚上能不能不要大声打电话？

en: It is said that Lycopene, a pigment found in tomatoes, makes your skin beautiful and helps you lose weight.
zh: 据说番茄红素，一种在西红柿中发现的色素，能让你的皮肤变得美丽，并帮助你减肥。

en: I understand that life without love is impossible for me.
zh: 我明白没有爱的生活对我来说是不可能的。

en: What are your favorite ingredients to put into Miso soup?
zh: 你最喜欢在味噌汤里放什么食材？

en: I didn't think that university would be so much fun.
zh: 我没想到大学会这么有趣。

en: It's best to discuss relationship issues directly with your partner.
zh: 最好直接和你的伴侣讨论感情问题。

en: I am rapidly losing the ability of immersing myself in activities that I love.
zh: 我正在迅速失去沉浸在我喜欢的活动中的能力。

en: Sorry, I'm bad at explaining.
Tom's translation is too focused on the rhythm of English translation, and ignores the nuances of the original.
zh: 汤姆的翻译太注重英文翻译的节奏，而忽略了原文的细微之处。

en: My normal body temperature is around 37 degrees.
zh: 我正常的体温在37度左右。

en: I've had the flu since Monday. Right now, my temperature has gone down, but I don't feel completely normal yet.
zh: 我从星期一开始就得了流感。现在，我的体温已经降下来了，但感觉还没完全恢复正常。

en: My only worry is that I have no worries.
zh: 我唯一的担心就是我没有烦恼。

en: Tom's personality changes completely when he grabs the mic.
zh: 汤姆一拿起麦克风，性格就完全变了。

en: Don't run around the classrooms.
Don't run around the house.
I've lost my wallet.
I need to go to the hospital.
Tom works in Boston.
Tom is working in Boston.
Tom was worried that Mary's words were indirectly aimed at him, but in truth she was only talking about herself in a self-depreciating manner.
zh: 汤姆担心玛丽的话是间接针对他的，但事实上她只是在自嘲。

en: Sorry I doubted you.
As long as the whole world has not reached happiness, individual happiness is impossible.
zh: 只要全世界还没有达到幸福，个人的幸福是不可能的。

en: Happy people are those who remember only the good things from the past, while unhappy people are those who remember only the opposite.
zh: 快乐的人是那些只记得过去美好事物的人，而不快乐的人是那些只记得相反事物的人。

en: Please look at the pamphlet for the details.
